name: test Discharge Summary Report
query:
SELECT 
    ds.date AS "Date Discharged",
    ir.discharge_datetime ,
    ds.patient as"Patient ID",
    ds.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:185",
    ds.date_of_birth AS "Date of Birth",
    ds.sex AS "Sex:Data:100",
    ds.type AS "Type:Data:100",
    ds.discharged_type AS "Discharge Type",
    ds.ref_practitioner AS "Doctor Name",
    ds.diagnosis_at_discharge AS "Diagnosis at Discharge:Data:250",
    ir.room AS "Room",
    ir.bed AS "Bed"
FROM 
    `tabDischarge Summery` ds
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabInpatient Record` ir
    ON ds.patient = ir.patient
WHERE 
    ds.date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s;
